text: Bjarne Fjærtoft (7 November 1899 - 28 August 1981) is a Norwegian politician for the Liberal Party. He was born in Jondal. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Møre og Romsdal in 1954, and was re-elected on one occasion. Fjærtoft held various positions in Ålesund city council from 1947 to 1955, serving as mayor in 1950-1951\. Outside politics he worked as a jurist, most notably as stipendiary magistrate (byfogd) in from 1946 to 1969, having graduated as cand.jur. in 1924. He was also involved in the local fish trade. ==References== * Category:1899 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Liberal Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Mayors of places in Møre og Romsdal Category:Politicians from Ålesund Category:Norwegian jurists Category:Jondal Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Bjarne Fjærtoft
